column2: the reason why we were at Uchi in the first place... the foie nigiri. Fun fact
column3: foie gras is banned in California. Foodies of California must leave home to try this. And this was the first time I have been able to. And it. was. fantastic. The flavors in this dish make it heaven in your mouth. There was a point where I wonder if I lost consciousness. Truly the highlight of a wonderful meal. And easily the heaviest dish of all -- even if it is one heavenly bite. We ordered three desserts: Â the lime ash sorbet
column5: and lemon gelato. All were excellent works of art but the peanut butter semifreddo was my favorite.
